title: Lily-Rose Depp joins her The King co-star boyfriend Timothee Chalamet for a romantic dinner in LA
text:
They made their romance official earlier this year after being linked for months.

And Lily-Rose Depp and her boyfriend Timothee Chalamet enjoyed a romantic dinner together in Los Angeles, California, on Friday.

The daughter of Johnny Depp and Vanessa Paradis, 20, cut a casual figure in a pair of high-waisted jeans with a black vest top.

Date night: Lily-Rose Depp and her boyfriend Timothee Chalamet enjoyed a romantic dinner together in Los Angeles, California, on Friday

Adding some finishing touches, she teamed her look with a pair of white platform trainers and draped a blue and pink jumper over her arm.

Lily styled her brunette locks into a sweptback hairdo and added just a slick of minimal make-up to enhance her pretty features.

While Timothee looked smart in a pair of black trousers with a matching coloured polo neck top and white trainers.

The two met on Netflix's The King with Lily playing Timothee's on-screen wife, Catherine of Valois, he plays King Henry V.

Dinner: The daughter of Johnny Depp and Vanessa Paradis, 20, cut a casual figure in a pair of high-waisted jeans with a black vest top

On-screen romance: The two met on Netflix's The King with Lily playing Timothee's on-screen wife, Catherine of Valois, he plays King Henry V (pictured in character)

Earlier this month, Lily revealed that sharing the screen with the Beautiful Boy actor in their new movie was 'nerve-wracking' because he's so talented.

She said': 'It's always exciting to work with somebody who you know has given themselves so wholeheartedly to their role and is so invested.

'It can be nerve-wracking to work with people whose talent you admire so much, but hopefully it can only make things better...

'It can be intimidating. But I think you can take it like that, or like, "How lucky am I to be working with so many people who are so great at what they do, and hopefully I can learn from them."'

Sweet: Earlier this month, Lily revealed that sharing the screen with the Beautiful Boy actor in their new movie was 'nerve-wracking' because he's so talented (Timothee pictured in character)

Rumours of a romance between Lily-Rose and Timothee began to swirl at the end of 2018 when fans caught the pair cosying up around New York City, walking with their arms around each other.

The young star has previously dodged confirming the romance rumours with Lily-Rose, but he did once tell a reporter at Access Hollywood that she made him speechless.

Last month the pair were seen packing on the PDA with each other on a yacht as they spent time together on holiday in Capri.

Lily-Rose and Timonthee are routinely spotted by fan accounts on 'dates' around Paris and New York, but sent the gossip mill into overdrive when they stepped out together at the Venice Film Festival earlier this year.
